title: Prohibits increase in state legislator's salary or allowance during lame duck session
summary: Prohibits the legislature from increasing the salary or allowance payable to members of the legislature by a law enacted during the period running from the date of the general election until 12/31 in any year in which members are elected to the legislature.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to limiting passage of laws increasing salaries and allowances of members of the state legislature
